item.title: 经济前景堪忧印尼股市下跌
item.description: 由于投资者对印尼经济前景日益感到不安，印尼股市周一暴跌，延续了此前的颓势。【原文：Indonesia stocks tumbled on Monday, extending a rout as investors grew jittery over the country’s economic outlook.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》：美国施压后马来西亚将收紧英伟达芯片资金流
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引马来西亚贸易部长的话称，在美国要求马来西亚密切关注可能流入中国的先进半导体之后，马来西亚计划对英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Malaysia plans tighter controls over the flow of Nvidia Corp.’s chips after the US demanded it keep a closer eye on advanced semiconductors that could potentially make their way to China, the Financial Times cited the trade minister as saying.】

item.title: 前花旗集团亚洲区董事总经理肖在香港起诉银行
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）泛亚执行服务部前主管菲利普-约翰-肖（Philip John Shaw）起诉了这家美国银行，对其在 2019 年 3 月被立即解雇一事提出异议，而在本月早些时候，其他前销售交易员也向该市的就业法庭提出了类似的索赔要求。【原文：Philip John Shaw, a former head of Pan-Asia Execution Services at Citigroup Inc., sued the US bank to contest his summary dismissal in March 2019, after other ex-sales traders filed similar claims with the city’s employment tribunal earlier this month.】

item.title: 詹姆斯-哈迪（James Hardie）在交易消息传出股价下挫前进行看跌交易
item.description: 就在这家澳大利亚建筑产品生产商表示将收购总部位于芝加哥的 AZEK 公司之前，大量看跌 James Hardie Industries Plc 期权易手，导致其股价下挫。【原文：A block of bearish James Hardie Industries Plc options changed hands just before the Australian building-products producer said it would buy Chicago-based AZEK Co., sending its stock sinking.】

item.title: 中国股票基金跑赢 99% 同行 消费者驱动反弹
item.description: 一家规模达 34 亿美元的中国股票基金在 2025 年的表现几乎优于所有同行，该基金的一位经理预计，消费者信心的转好将进一步提振国内股市。【原文：A manager of a $3.4 billion Chinese equity fund that’s outperformed virtually all of its peers in 2025 expects a turnaround in consumer confidence will further boost domestic shares.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 卡尼警告特朗普 "想搞垮我们" 加拿大大选拉开帷幕
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）在竞选之初就严正警告美国总统唐纳德-特朗普想要吞并加拿大是认真的，他开始努力让加拿大人相信他可以保护加拿大免受美国的侵略。【原文：Mark Carney began his bid for election with a stark warning that US President Donald Trump is serious about wanting to annex Canada, launching his effort to convince Canadians he can protect the country from US aggression.】

item.title: 印尼开始向新财富基金转让企业股份
item.description: 印度尼西亚已开始向新成立的主权财富基金 Danantara 转移顶级国有企业的所有权。【原文：Indonesia has started transferring ownership of top state companies to the new sovereign wealth fund Danantara.】

item.title: 特朗普新关税被认为更有分寸，金属走高
item.description: 工业金属攀升，原因是交易商在权衡美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下一轮关税措施的结果，预计这些措施的针对性将强于此前的预期。【原文：Industrial metals climbed as traders weighed the outcome from President Donald Trump’s next round of tariffs, which are expected to be more targeted than previously suggested.】

item.title: 菲律宾证券交易所称周一推迟开市
item.description: 菲律宾证券交易所运营商表示，由于连接问题，该交易所周一的交易被推迟。【原文：Trading on the Philippine Stock Exchange was delayed on Monday due to a connection issue, its operator said.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服吹嘘基于中国芯片的人工智能突破
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马云支持的蚂蚁金服集团利用中国制造的半导体开发出了训练人工智能模型的技术，可将成本降低 20%。【原文：Jack Ma-backed Ant Group Co. used Chinese-made semiconductors to develop techniques for training AI models that would cut costs by 20%, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛的纳克曼认为监管机构将更多关注私人信贷
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. plans to spend more time with regulators regarding its private markets work as both profits and scrutiny across the space grow, the firm’s head of asset management said.】

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚市政养老金探索美国私人信贷基金
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚州市政退休系统首席执行官在接受彭博电视采访时表示，该系统正在将私人信贷作为美国国内战略，同时寻求资产多元化。【原文：The Pennsylvania Municipal Retirement System is looking at private credit as a US domestic strategy, while it seeks asset diversification, its chief executive officer said in an interview with Bloomberg Television.】

item.title: 神华计划将资金从煤炭转向电力和化工
item.description: 中国最大的煤矿企业中国神华能源股份有限公司计划在价格疲软的情况下维持生产，同时将支出转用于其他业务。【原文：China Shenhua Energy Co., the nation’s largest coal miner, plans to maintain production despite weak prices, while diverting spending to other businesses.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮让亚洲数据中心成为贷款交易磁石
item.description: 人工智能的发展推动了亚洲数据中心的融资热潮，催生了一系列破纪录的贷款，并使更多潜在交易充斥其中。【原文：Artificial intelligence advances are fueling a funding frenzy for data centers in Asia, spawning a series of record breaking loans and filling the pipeline with even more potential deals.】

item.title: 在味噌汤中发现啮齿动物导致寿喜屋东主股票暴跌
item.description: 经营日本连锁餐厅 Sukiya 的 Zensho Holdings Co.股价下跌高达 7.1%，为 2 月 13 日以来最大跌幅，此前该公司称一名顾客在其味噌汤中发现了一只死老鼠。【原文：Shares of Zensho Holdings Co., which operates Japanese restaurant chain Sukiya, fell as much as 7.1%, the most since Feb. 13, after the firm said a customer had found a dead rodent in its miso soup.】

item.title: CATL 的锂合作伙伴 Lopal 认为近期价格将出现波动
item.description: 中国电池材料生产商江苏洛铂科技股份有限公司（Jiangsu Lopal Tech Co.【原文：Jiangsu Lopal Tech Co., a Chinese battery-material producer, said the lithium market will be volatile in the near term as supply growth outpaces demand.】

item.title: 特朗普助推避险需求，黄金稳定在历史高位附近
item.description: 尽管有迹象表明美国下一波关税可能比预期更具针对性，但由于经济和地缘政治风险支撑了避风港需求，黄金在连续两天下跌后持稳。【原文：Gold was steady — after two days of declines — as economic and geopolitical risks supported haven demand, despite signs that the next wave of US tariffs may be more targeted than expected.】

item.title: 中国能源转型与太阳能过剩和廉价电力的矛盾
item.description: 中国的绿色能源转型正处于关键时刻，太阳能行业供过于求、电力价格下降以及对化石燃料的持续依赖都有可能使转型进程脱轨。【原文：The green energy transition in China is at a critical juncture, as oversupply in the solar sector, declining power prices, and continued reliance on fossil fuels threaten to derail progress.】

item.title: 美国科技股大跌助推韩国散户投资者疯狂下注
item.description: 华尔街的阴霾给美国例外论的一些最坚定支持者带来了压力：韩国寻求风险的散户投资者。【原文：The sense of gloom on Wall Street is putting pressure on some of the most committed backers of American exceptionalism: South Korea’s risk-seeking retail investors.】

item.title: 英国工党在财政大臣的关键一周面临忠诚度考验
item.description: 在英国财政大臣准备宣布削减数十亿英镑开支之际，蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）本周将面临一场避免党内异议的斗争。【原文：Rachel Reeves faces a battle this week to avoid dissent from within her own party as Britain’s Chancellor of the Exchequer prepares to announce billions of pounds in spending cuts.】

item.title: 英国人对家庭餐饮的胃口不太可能对通胀构成威胁
item.description: 英国竞争激烈的食品杂货业往往能确保食品保持相对便宜的价格，但购物者却面临着一个奇怪的局面，尽管人们在谈论超市价格战，但通胀率却在上升。【原文：The UK’s competitive grocery sector tends to ensure that food stays relatively cheap, yet shoppers are facing a curious situation as inflation rises despite talk of a supermarket price war.】

item.title: 伊拉克就浮式天然气终端进行谈判以弥补电力缺口
item.description: 在欧佩克第二大产油国努力解决因美国对伊朗采取行动而造成的电力短缺问题之际，伊拉克正在与几家公司进行谈判，以确保在 6 月初之前获得两套浮式储存再气化装置。【原文：Iraq is in talks with several companies to secure two floating storage regasification units by early June, as OPEC’s second-biggest producer tries to address power shortages caused by a US move against Iran.】

item.title: 市场权衡特朗普关税政策，油价周初保持稳定
item.description: 本周伊始，石油价格持稳，因为交易商权衡了美国加征更多关税的影响以及欧佩克+即将增加的供应量。【原文：Oil was steady at the start of the week as traders weighed the fallout from more US tariffs and an upcoming boost in OPEC+ supply.】

item.title: 韩国法院将就韩总理弹劾案作出裁决
item.description: 韩国一家法院即将决定是否罢免在总统尹锡烈颁布戒严令后被弹劾的总理韩德洙，这也是法官们对总统政治赌博的罕见看法。【原文：A South Korean court is poised to decide whether to oust Prime Minister Han Duck-soo who was impeached in the aftermath of President Yoon Suk Yeol’s martial law decree, giving a rare glimpse into the judges’ view on the president’s political gamble.】

item.title: 比亚迪财报或将成为与 CATL 市值之争的定海神针
item.description: 比亚迪公司（BYD Co. ）周一晚些时候发布的财报可能会巩固这家电动汽车领军企业作为中国最有价值非国有在岸股票的地位。【原文：BYD Co.’s earnings later Monday could be the factor cementing the electric-vehicle leader’s place as China’s most valuable non-state onshore stock.】

item.title: 美国政府正在推动价值 1.8 万亿美元的 ESG 市场发展
item.description: 随着投资者抢购主要由美国政府机构出售的债券，即使唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）引领绿色退潮，可持续债务市场的一个1.8万亿美元的角落仍在抵御更广泛的经济衰退。【原文：A $1.8 trillion corner of the sustainable debt market is defying the wider downturn as investors snap up bonds sold largely by US government agencies even as Donald Trump leads a green retreat.】

item.title: TOMS Capital 推动 Kenvue 出售和分拆
item.description: TOMS Capital 投资管理公司（TOMS Capital Investment Management）已持有 Kenvue Inc.【原文：TOMS Capital Investment Management has amassed a stake in Kenvue Inc. and is pushing for changes at the consumer health company, which has only just avoided a battle with an activist investor.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因不确定性上升而承压：市场综述
item.description: 本周亚洲市场开局谨慎，交易员们在地缘政治风险与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将实施的下一轮贸易关税可能被淡化的迹象之间权衡利弊。【原文：Asian markets are set for a cautious start to the week as traders juggle geopolitical risks with signs that the looming next round of Donald Trump’s trade tariffs could be watered down.】

item.title: 美国对中国船只征收数十亿美元税款可能带来 "贸易启示录 "风险
item.description:
批评人士将在周一的听证会上指出，针对商船的举措可能比特朗普的关税更具破坏性。【原文：

Critics will tell a hearing on Monday that the move against commercial ships could be more disruptive for global trade than Trump’s tariffs.
